page.title: 03Ollerton - Facts and Figures
page.content:
The latest available census figures (from the 1981 Census) revealed the following population figures:- {Population} __________ Year Ollerton Boughton Total ________________________________
1951 3897 n/a n/a 1961 5529 n/a n/a 1981 7150 5965 13,115 _________________________________ Another census (from the Disadvantage Report, 1983) produced the information in the next two tables.One of these shows a striking contrast between the percentage of people without a car in the adjoining villages of Ollerton and Boughton.(See Page 4.)
